Continuous validation

â€¦or is it automating validated learning? Anyway. We like to be sure that software has a purpose. We also like to make sure it keeps on having a purpose. That's why we created Gareth, a continuous validation framework. Meet Gareth

IOE

We like to connect not only some things but everything. Whether it is automating your coffee machine with an app or requesting the windspeed in timbuktu for some project. That's why we are working on the Internet Of Everything (IOE).

Machine learning

Some call us just lazy. Some call our ideas crazy. Maybe we are both but we like to think that computers can do almost everything we can do. They just need to learn how to do it.

We're hiring

We are always looking for software craftsmen who want to work on innovative projects and products in an informal envirionment. Just leave us an message below or connect with us through Twitter
